channel.title: 🏢 Tübingen AI Center on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Tübingen AI Center on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Measuring Per-Unit Interpretability at Scale Without Humans
item.description: New scalable method measures per-unit interpretability in vision DNNs without human evaluation, revealing anti-correlation between model performance and interpretability.
